name: Crobat
flavorText:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.

previous.name: Ariados
previous.flavorText:
It spins string
not only from its
rear but also from its mouth. It is
hard to tell which
end is which.

next.name: Chinchou
next.flavorText:
Chinchou blink their shining antennae at one
another to claim their respective turf.

pokemon.name: Zubat
pokemon.flavorText:
Forms colonies in
perpetually dark
places. Uses ultrasonic waves
to identify and
approach targets.

pokemon.name: Golbat
pokemon.flavorText:
Once it strikes,
it will not stop
draining energy from the victim
even if it gets
too heavy to fly.

pokemon.name: Crobat
pokemon.flavorText:
It flies so si­
lently through the
dark on its four wings that it may
not be noticed
even when nearby.
